findings.title: FSA - Fixed Swap Address
findings.description: The swap address is assigned once in the constructor and it cannot be changed, which may not allow the contract to catch up with future swap updates.

findings.title: L01 - Public Function could be Declared External
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: Constant state variables should be declared constant to save gas.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The contract does not follow the Solidity naming convention.
